keyPolicies.policyDescription: The deficit halved as a share of our economy.
Income tax cut for 26 million people.
Fuel duty frozen - saving 20p a litre.
A million more children in good or outstanding schools. 2 million new apprenticeships delivered.
Crime down by more than a fifth.
The EU budget cut and an EU referendum by the end of 2017.

issues.brexitEurope: The EU budget cut and an EU referendum by the end of 2017.
issues.economy: The deficit halved as a share of our economy.
issues.education: A million more children in good or outstanding schools. 2 million new apprenticeships delivered.

images.caption: Chamali Fernando campaigning for Conservatives in Cambridge for the election dated 7th May 2015.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Sources for the data are mentioned at the bottom of the leaflet.
